title: Art in the high desert
caption: Art in the high desert
desc: The desert doubles as an art studio this week at Arches National Park in the US state of Utah, as painters congregate for the Red Rock Art Festival. This event is a celebration of what the French call painting ‘en plein air’ or painting outside. Sounds like a fabulous idea to us (and what a view!).
copyright: Arches National Park, Moab, Utah, USA (© Whit Richardson/Alamy Stock Photo)
